videos.title: React Native Tutorial #02 : Installation of React Native CLI on Windows | Step by Step Setup 2024
videos.description:
React Native Tutorial: Installation of React Native CLI on Windows | Step by Step Setup 2024 ( Hindi / Urdu )

React Native Full Course 2024 in Hindi

Dive into our detailed React Native Tutorial: Installation of React Native CLI on Windows! In this step-by-step guide, we'll walk you through the entire process of setting up React Native CLI in a Windows environment. First, we'll install Chocolatey, then use it to install Node.js LTS and JDK17. Next, we'll download and install Android Studio and set up the necessary environment variables. Finally, we'll create a React Native CLI project and run it on an AVD (Android Virtual Device). Each concept is explained with easy, practical examples to ensure a beginner-friendly experience.
